summary: As a dynamic, hands-on, multilingual Engineer I am regarded for applying extensive R&D processes and Six Sigma methodologies to implement system improvements and optimize the quality of projects. I am passionate about delivering dedicated and high-quality service combined with strong social and communication skills. Colleagues consider me an analytic thinker who thoroughly researches, evaluates and develops scalable solutions to complex problems. I thrive in multi-disciplinary, diverse, and global environments that champion both personal and professional growth.
